activities:
Name and address information received through on-line questionnaires for the purpose of identifying employee workstation survey information for website databases hosted on behalf of respondents’ employers.
Names and addresses are collected for the purpose of shipping materials purchased from Humantech through website links or email requests
Credit card information and company information received for the purpose of invoicing and collecting payments from customers.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Czech Republic, France, Germany, Ireland, Italy, Luxembourg, Netherlands, Poland, Portugal, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, United Kingdom
privacyprograms: HUMANTECH, INC. has given permission to REGISTEREDSITE INTERNET SERVICES to secure its Web site with a VeriSign digital server certificate, which uses industry-standard SSL technology to encrypt information, such as credit card numbers, sent to SSL-secured pages on this site.
